abstract.text: Use lookup tables to apply color transformations to images.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: Lookup table functions use the value of a source pixel as an index into a lookup table of colors that defines the corresponding destination pixel. You can use lookup table functions to perform tasks, such as color grading, converting between color spaces, or generating false-color images.

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
